original_text: Now Barzillai the Gileadite had come down from Rogelim, and he went on with the king to the Jordan, to escort him over the Jordan.
korean_text: 길르앗 사람 바르실래가 왕이 요단을 건너가게 하려고 로글림에서 내려와 함께 요단에 이르니

sentences.original_text: Now Barzillai the Gileadite had come down from Rogelim
and he went on with the king to the Jordan
to escort him over the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 왕을 요단 강 건너편까지 호위하기 위해
